text: When would the development on this proposal will begin? <https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/wiki/Next-Ledger-Architecture-Proposal#motivation>

attachments.title: hyperledger/fabric
attachments.text: fabric - Fabric is a blockchain project in Incubation proposed to the community and documented at <https://goo.gl/RYQZ5N>. Information on what Incubation entails can be found in the Hyperledger Proj...

text:
I am very interesting in seeing , 
>Point in time queries - The ability to query chaincode state at previous blocks and easily trace lineage without replaying transactions

<@U126PEMNH> - the community is currently working on getting out a "milestone" release and shoring up some of the current features with docs and testing.  I'd expect that things will kick off on looking at the new architecture starting in the July timeframe.  Of course feel free to make any comments / suggestions / complaints etc in the meantime
